function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Less strict stance on privacy issues","Impact":"Potential for increased data breaches and privacy violations","Mitigation":"Implement stronger data protection measures and regulations, increase transparency in data handling","Technologies":"Blockchain for data encryption and decentralized storage, privacy-focused IoT devices","People":"General public, users of IoT devices","Owner":"Government, technology companies, data protection organizations"},{"Description":"Stricter cleaning and tracking requirements for businesses","Impact":"Increased operational costs for businesses, potential resistance from employees and customers","Mitigation":"Invest in IoT-enabled cleaning and tracking systems, provide employee and customer education on the benefits of these systems","Technologies":"IoT sensors for monitoring cleanliness and tracking, cloud-based data management systems","People":"Business owners, employees, customers","Owner":"Business owners, cleaning companies, technology companies"},{"Description":"Recession impacting automotive companies' ability to invest in IoT initiatives","Impact":"Slower innovation in automotive IoT technologies, lack of resources for safety and efficiency improvements","Mitigation":"Collaborate with public-private partnerships, seek government funding for critical IoT projects, prioritize cost-effective IoT solutions","Technologies":"Connected vehicle technology, intelligent transportation systems, cost-efficient IoT sensors","People":"Automotive industry stakeholders, employees in the automotive sector","Owner":"Automotive companies, government, public-private partnerships"}]}
